TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OpenedHandler(object o, OpenedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed OpenedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the OpenedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the OpenedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the OpenedHandler is removed from the event.
